dart-hj3415
==========

dart-hj3415 gather dart data from https://opendart.fss.or.kr and analyse it.


Quick start
------------

1. For getting dart data
   > from dart_hj3415 import dart
   > 
   > dart.get_df(<<sdate:str>>, <<edate:str>>, <<code:str>>, <<title:str>>, <<restrict:bool>>, <<echo:bool>>)
